Activities.Gambling: If you want to try your luck, come to our variety of gambling halls. Our Dealers are ready to show you a grand time. Perhaps you may come out richer than you started!
Activities.Swimming: Whether you want fun in the sun or just to relax, our pool will fit your expectations! with plenty of lawnchairs and space to wander, you can soak up the rays or have a 'splashing' time!
Activities.Buffet: Feeling Hungry? Pop on over to our buffet area! With food types from around the world, you can taste the world on the end of your tongue! From types of chinese and mongolian all the way to Great British cuisine, give your tastebuds a tour!
Activities.Dance: Dances have always been around throughout every culture. Whether for purpose or for fun, Dancing can really assist in making your trip well worth your time! We offer a variety of dancing types from country to breakdancing, with lessons to help you get started! Dance the night away!
Activities.Hottub: Want to spend time with friends and just hang out? Then the hot tub's for you! Plenty of space to fit any group of friends, you can also ask for the right tools to help things along, whether that be a floating cooler for your beverages or a table to play with waterproffed cards. Anybody want to play poker?
